T02D2312:252a-2: # // aa ho srid rtsa bde ba che //
T02D2312:252a-3: sems can kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2312:252a-4: gnyis med bde bas tshim gyur pas //
T02D2312:252a-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal //
T02D2312:252b-0: thabs chen @252b gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dag / rol pa bde ba'i nyams dang ldan //
T02D2312:252b-1: phrin las mdzad pa'i dgongs pa las //
T02D2312:252b-2: dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshul du bzhugs //
T02D2312:252b-3: thabs kyis bskul bas shes rab chags //
T02D2312:252b-4: de bzhin shes rab bde zhen sel //
T02D2312:252b-5: gnyis med rol pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2312:252b-7: rdo rje dbang gis stobs ldan pas //
T02D2312:252b-8: 'khor lo bzhi dang srog shing gsum //
T02D2312:252b-9: me rlung thabs ldan sbyor shes pas //
T02D2312:252b-10: ye shes nam mkha' lta bu mthong //
T02D2312:252b-11: gang de thabs las byung ba ni //
T02D2312:252b-12: gnas bcud thig le mi dmigs pas //
T02D2312:252b-13: bde chen thig le'i stobs las byung //
T02D2312:252b-14: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gsal //
T02D2312:252b-15: phung sogs 'jig rten brtags pa kun //
T02D2312:252b-16: rang snang sgyu mar snang tsam las //
T02D2312:252b-17: phyi nang bden gnyis mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D2312:252b-18: ma 'dres gcig dang du ma bral //
T02D2312:252b-19: bde chen thig le rang byung las //
T02D2312:252b-20: man ngag ldan pas rgyas btab pas //
T02D2312:252b-21: ma rig gnyis 'dzin la sogs dang //
T02D2312:252b-22: dman pa'i theg pa ring du spangs //
T02D2312:252b-24: 'dar dang rgyud dang sgra sogs dang //
T02D2312:252b-25: rang gsal mngon shes 'chi med sogs //
T02D2312:252b-26: skye med nam mkha'i rang bzhin gsal //
T02D2312:252b-27: rtsa dang rnam shes rgyu ba las//
T02D2312:252b-28: mi dmigs brjod med gang goms pa //
T02D2312:252b-29: grangs las 'das pa'i ye shes kyang //
T02D2312:252b-30: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong //
T02D2312:252b-31: rang byung bde ba thob mtha' med //
T02D2312:252b-32: ngo bo nyid kyis bde mthong zhing //
T02D2312:252b-33: thig le rang shar sprul pa yis //
T02D2312:252b-34: mdzad pa'i rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab //
T02D2312:252b-35: bde chen theg par grol ba yis //
T02D2312:252b-36: bstan pa'i rim pa mtha' yas kyang //
T02D2312:252b-37: sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du //
T02D2312:252b-38: thig le chen po'i ngang las 'byung //
T02D2312:252b-39: dug gis dug nad bsal ba ltar //
T02D2312:252b-41: skyes bu thabs kyis bder 'jug pa //
T02D2312:252b-43: bskyed pa thabs kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2312:252b-44: aa la cung zad bde bas reg / rang byung gsang ba'i lam du dril //
T02D2312:252b-45: rang rang 'khor lo thim par byed //
T02D2312:252b-46: ma lus bde bar shar ba las //
T02D2312:252b-47: 'khor ba'i bag chags ma lus sangs //
T02D2312:252b-48: tha dad la sogs chos med de //
T02D2312:252b-49: skye med bde ba'i snying por gsal //
T02D2312:253a-0: @253a * // 'chol pa sprin gyi dum bu dang //
T02D2312:253a-1: nyi zla sgra gcan mkha' la 'du //
T02D2312:253a-2: drag po pho brang sgo la srungs //
T02D2312:253a-3: mgo med rang gi gnas na 'gying //
T02D2312:253a-4: stobs kyis gnas sa'i ga'u sbyor //
T02D2312:253a-5: zla ba nam mkha'i dbyings su bstim //
T02D2312:253a-6: nyi mas bkod pa'i chu g-yo zhing //
T02D2312:253a-8: 'phen dang sdud par byed pa dang //
T02D2312:253a-9: gyen du 'gro dang thur la bskul //
T02D2312:253a-11: bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub //
T02D2312:253a-13: gdod nas grub par gnyis su med //
T02D2312:253a-14: ma lus bde ba'i gzugs su shar //
T02D2312:253a-15: gsang chen mi ldog rigs su nges //
T02D2312:253a-17: me tog la ni chu bzhin du //
T02D2312:253a-18: shes rab gsum la goms pa yis //
T02D2312:253a-19: gsang ba gsum la spyad par bya //
T02D2312:253a-20: thabs chen ldan la mngon sum ste //
T02D2312:253a-22: mnyam pa chen po mchog gi dbyings //
T02D2312:253a-23: thabs shes gnyis med rdo rje'i lus //
T02D2312:253a-24: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02D2312:253a-25: dpag med log par 'khyams pa rnams //
T02D2312:253a-26: thabs kyis ma skyes pa la bkod //
T02D2312:253a-27: 'chi ba med pa'i chos skur thim //
T02D2312:253a-28: bde ba chen pos khyab pa'i ro //
T02D2312:253a-29: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pas //
T02D2312:253a-30: sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i //
T02D2312:253a-31: thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal //
T02D2312:253a-32: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tilli pas sgyu ma sprul
T02D2312:253a-33: pa'i grong khyer du smad 'tshong ma la gdams pa
T02D2312:253a-34: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba chen po zhes
